fullText: Diana is a musical that seems to have been written by someone who has heard of emotions but never personally experienced one.
dtliExcerpt: Diana is a musical that seems to have been written by someone who has heard of emotions but never personally experienced one.
bwwExcerpt: Speaking of day drinking, the best Diana can hope for is that its tackiness will transform, through the magic of mess-addicted theatergoers, into a sort of warmly accepted kitsch. The show's social-media account has been encouraging people to have wine beforehand, cheering "here for a good time not a long time!" There's plenty of evidence that the show's creators Joe DiPietro and David Bryan are going for a kind of late-night extended-SNL-sketch vibe.
